summary:
Automatically switch to first person view and zoom up when talking.
Did you feel like the Oblivion's conversation? It is my goal :)
descriptionHtml:
--- Description ---

Automatically switch to first person when talking. you can also switch back and forth between first person and third person.
Did you feel like the Oblivion conversation? It is my goal :)


--- Videos ---

[youtube]kXnZftWVtx8[/youtube][youtube]SJcsvoYCX8I[/youtube]
[youtube]kBQdKepdMNw[/youtube][youtube]skaARZooSPE[/youtube]


--- Requirements ---

Skyrim 1.9.32
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]Â 1.6.16+
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url] (Utilizes the Mod Configuration Menu feature)


--- My Recommended ---

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35303]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23600]Player Headtracking[/url] by Maegfaer


--- Incompatible mod ---

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/71063]-Facelight Plus[/url] by gunder (I recommend to use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13457]tktk's original mod[/url])

-Flawless Widescreen
[url=https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/30533-0-1501060168.jpg][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/30533-0-1501060168.jpg[/img][/url]


--- Installation ---

Recommended: Download using the Nexus Mod Manager, then enable and run.
Manual install: Download the archive and extract the contents to the data folder (C://.../steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/).


--- Uninstallation ---

Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager, or manually delete the following files from the data folder:
towConversation.esp
towConversation.bsl
towConversation.bsa
skse/plugins/towConversation.dll


--- Special thanks ---

himika


[url=http://skyrimgems.com/][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url]
category 100 - UI
author: towawot

files.name: Face to face conversation 3_1
files.changelogHtml:
I remade papyrus script and skse plugin.
Added a feature "third person zoom".
Deleted the auto switch third person view feature.
Added the "toggle mode". fov and pov.
I am going to solve "camera stack" issue.

files.name: Face to face conversation 3_2
files.changelogHtml:
MCM translation text update.
Camera reset function added.
